Message:
I first met Queen Amleth
not too long after she was born.

The moment her small hand
gripped my finger...
I made a vow—

to protect her until
I breathed my last.

However, a fight for
the crown plunged her
entire family into war.
It was too much for Queen
Amleth’s heart to bear.

Their lust for the thone
endangered the lives
of the citizens,

so she had no choice but
to take Executioner and
put an end to it all.

A light of solitude emanated
from her eyes—sharp enough
to pierce through the sadness
that was once in its place.

If such loneliness is the destiny
that must be borne by those
who are called rulers...

would I even be able to
stand by her side?
